contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 22, 2018 D Swiss Open
Swiss Open 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
swiss-open
Swiss Open Contest presented nearly 50 different Bands from 11 Countries in it's 25 Years of History till 2014. It was held in Kultur-Casino Bern first and since 1999 the 'Salle Blanche' in KKL Luzern provides a wonderful Frame for this popular Event.
See Also Contest Website: http://www.worldbandfestival.ch/ Switzerland
Set Test and Own Choice
Phoenicia - Symphonic Sketches For Brass Band
Kultur und Kongresszentrum (KKL), Luzern, Switzerland 20th Edition of World Band Festival (Festive Week). World Premiere of 'Phoenicia'. Valaisia Brass Band again absent due to Participation at British Open as Defending Champion.
Commence: 09.00 am.
Best Contest March: Brass Band Berner Oberland Best Own Choice: Brassband Bürgermusik Luzern
Sept. 26, 2015, 12:25 p.m. Nov. 19, 2018, 2:04 p.m.
1 Brass Band Berner Oberland Corsin Tuor Prometheus (Sinfonische Dichtung Nr. 5)
2 Brass Band Treize Etoiles James Gourlay Mazeppa [Liszt]
3 Brassband Bürgermusik Luzern Michael Bach The Pines of Rome (Pini di Roma) [O. Respighi, arr. H. Snell]
4 Ensemble de Cuivres Valaisan Francois Roh Symphony No 2 (excerpts)
5 Brass Band Fribourg Maurice Donnet-Monay The Corsair
6 Brass Band Luzern Land Herve Grelat Concerto for Orchestra [Bartok]
7 Wallberg Brass Band Ivan Meylemans Feste Romane (L'Ottobrata and La Befana) [O. Respighi, arr. H.Snell]
8 Liberty Brass Band Ostschweiz Stefan Roth Symphonic Dances [Rachmaninov]
9 Oberaargauer Brass Band Christoph Luchsinger Russian Easter Festival Overture [N. Rimski-Korsakov, arr. B. Moren]
10 Constellation Brass Band Yvan Lagger Firebird (excerpts)
